projects.title: Akil
projects.description: A platform for individuals to find opportunities that match their skills and for organizations to connect with individuals.

projects.title: Business Management System
projects.description: A comprehensive web application for a company to efficiently manage and track various aspects of its operations, including purchases, sales, inventory levels, customers, transactions, and provisions.

projects.title: RateEat
projects.description: A revolutionary food item rating application that allows users to provide ratings and reviews for individual food items, rather than the entire restaurants.

projects.title: Web File Manager
projects.description: A web-based file management system that allows users to upload, organize, and share files with intuitive folder navigation and collaborative features.

projects.title: Histori
projects.description: An interactive 3D globe application that visualizes world history transformations over time, allowing users to explore political landscapes and historical events through timeline navigation.
